resources.string: We need a special permission to continue. Use ADB to run the following command (one line):
adb shell pm grant com.draco.buoy android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
Undo all changes done by the app and restore secure settings to default.
Marginally conserve battery without impeding the user experience
Apply additional tweaks to save more battery without yet sacrificing performance
Sacrifice significant performance for a significant gain in power
Apply the maximum changes available to save power at the expense of a fluid user experience
